emerging_technologies.name: Emotionally Intelligent AI Agents
emerging_technologies.description: AI agents capable of interpreting and responding to human emotions with nuanced empathy.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Enhancement of mental health support, personalized education, and more natural customer interactions, raising questions about privacy and emotional manipulation.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Widespread adoption depends on breakthroughs in emotional recognition technology, ethical guidelines, and public acceptance of AI in sensitive areas.

emerging_technologies.name: Agent Governance Frameworks
emerging_technologies.description: Systems for managing and overseeing AI agent networks to ensure ethical behavior and decision-making.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Promotes trust in AI systems, reduces risk of AI misuse, but introduces regulatory complexities.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Adoption will be driven by regulatory pressure, industry standards, and the need for transparency in AI operations.

emerging_technologies.name: AI-Driven Autonomous Construction
emerging_technologies.description: Autonomous AI agents that can design, plan, and execute construction projects with minimal human intervention.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Accelerates infrastructure development, reduces labor-intensive work, but may lead to job displacement.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Requires advancements in robotics, AI safety protocols, and legal frameworks for autonomous construction.

mainstream_technologies.name: General-Purpose AI Agents
mainstream_technologies.description: AI agents capable of performing a wide range of tasks with human-like adaptability and decision-making.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Widespread in businesses for automation, personal assistance, and various service sectors. Adoption driven by productivity gains and cost reduction.

mainstream_technologies.name: Agent-Human Collaborative Systems
mainstream_technologies.description: Systems where humans and AI agents work together seamlessly, enhancing each other's capabilities.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Becomes standard in workplaces for efficiency, creativity, and problem-solving. Adoption facilitated by advances in natural language processing and trust-building technologies.

epoch_themes.description: A focus on autonomous systems in various sectors, from personal assistance to industrial applications.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Shifts in labor markets, increased productivity, and potential societal upheaval due to automation.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Global competition for AI supremacy, with nations investing heavily in autonomous tech to gain strategic advantages.

epoch_themes.description: A growing emphasis on ethical considerations in AI development and deployment.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Promotes responsible AI use, but also introduces new ethical dilemmas regarding AI rights and responsibilities.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Emergence of international standards for AI ethics, influencing technology policies worldwide.
